mapper.select:
select a.podt_code, a.res_usage, b.rsc_code as resCode, prod_detail(b.rsc_code) as rscName, b.store_etc, b.ost_cnt
from Prdt_bom_res a join resource_store b on a.res_code = b.rsc_code where b.store_etc = #{comCode} and ost_cnt is not null and a.podt_code = #{podtCode}
select emp_id, emp_name, etc from Employee_info where position_code = 'W004' and dept_code = 'D003'
mapper.insert: insert into materials_LOT (MAT_NO, MAT_LOTNO, COM_CODE, RSC_CODE) values ( (select nvl(max(MAT_NO),0)+1 from materials_LOT), #{rscLot}, #{comCode}, #{resCode} )
mapper.select: select nvl(max(COM_CODE),0) as comCode from manufacture_command_d
mapper.insert: insert into resource_store(STORE_NO, --자재 입출고 번호 RSC_CODE, --자재코드 IST_FLAG, --입고유무 RSC_LOT, --자재LOT IST_CNT, --입고량 OST_CNT, --출고량 STORE_DATE, --입출고 날짜 STORE_FLAG, --입출고 구분 STORE_ETC) --비고(생산지시번호) values( F_CODE_MAKER('RO') , #{resCode}, 'N', #{rscLot}, 0, #{ostCnt}, sysdate, '출고', #{comCode} )

insert into manufacture_command (COM_CODE, MAN_PLAN_NO, COM_DATE, COM_NAME) values ( f_code_maker('C'), #{manPlanNo}, #{comDate}, (select SUBSTR(sysdate, 4, 7)||' '||'지시'|| (select count(com_date) +1 from manufacture_command where com_date = to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd') ) from dual) )

insert into manufacture_command_d ( COM_CODE, PODT_CODE, MAN_STARTDATE, MAN_GOALPERDAY, ORD_QNT, ORD_DUEDATE, EMP_ID, COM_ETC)
values ( (select SUBSTR(max(com_code),0,7) || LPAD(SUBSTR(max(com_code),8,10), 3, 0) from manufacture_command), #{podtCode}, to_date(#{planStartdate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{manGoalPerday}, #{ordQnt}, to_date(#{ordDuedate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{empId}, '지시완료' )
mapper.select: select a.podt_code, prod_detail(a.podt_code) podtName, a.ord_qnt, to_char(a.ord_duedate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ordDuedate, a.man_goalperday, a.com_etc, a.emp_id, to_char(a.man_startdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as manStartDate, b.plan_period, b.man_perday, b.plan_etc, b.plan_no_detail, b.man_plan_no from man_command_view a left join manufacture_plan_d b on a.podt_code = b.podt_code and a.ord_qnt = b.ord_qnt where a.podt_code = #{podtCode} and b.plan_etc = '생산지시중' and b.plan_no_detail = #{planNoDetail}

select a.podt_code, b.RSC_LOT, SUM(b.IST_CNT) AS istCnt, (SUM(b.IST_CNT)-SUM(b.OST_CNT)) AS rscCnt, b.RSC_CODE as resCode, FN_GET_CODE_NAME(b.RSC_CODE) AS rscName, FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(b.RSC_CODE) AS RSC_UNIT
from prdt_bom_res a join RESOURCE_STORE b on a.res_code = b.rsc_code where a.podt_code= #{podtCode} GROUP BY a.podt_code, b.RSC_LOT , b.RSC_CODE having SUM(b.IST_CNT)-SUM(b.OST_CNT)>0 order by b.rsc_code

select c.podt_code, c.proc_code, prod_detail(c.proc_code) as procName, d.fac_no, d.fac_code, prod_detail(d.fac_code) facName, d.fac_status, d.fac_output/d.fac_runtime*24 outputDay from process_flowInfo c left join (select a.fac_no, a.fac_code, prod_detail(a.fac_code), a.fac_status, b.proc_code, a.fac_output , a.fac_runtime from facility_status a join facility_process b on a.fac_no = b.fac_no ) d on c.proc_code = d.proc_code where c.podt_code = #{podtCode}
select podt_code, prod_detail(podt_code) podtName, res_code, res_usage, proc_code, prod_detail(proc_code) ProcName from prdt_bom_res where podt_code= #{podtCode} order by res_code

select a.podt_code, prod_detail(a.podt_code) podtName, a.man_plan_name, to_char(a.man_plan_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as manPlanDate, a.plan_no_detail, a.man_plan_no, a.plan_etc from man_plan_view a left outer join manufacture_command b on a.man_plan_no = b.man_plan_no where (a.plan_etc ='계획완료' or a.plan_etc ='생산지시중')
and to_char(a.man_plan_date, 'rrrr-MM-dd') >= #{startDate}
and #{endDate} >= to_char(a.man_plan_date, 'rrrr-MM-dd')
order by a.man_plan_no

select a.podt_code, to_char(a.ord_duedate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as ordDuedate, b.plan_no_detail, b.podt_code, prod_detail(b.podt_code) podtName, b.ord_qnt, b.plan_period, b.man_plan_no, to_char(b.plan_startdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as planStartdate,
(select DISTINCT man_perday from manufacture_plan_d where podt_code = b.podt_code) as manPerday,
(select sum(a.man_goalperday) from man_command_view a join man_plan_view b on a.man_plan_no = b.man_plan_no and b.plan_no_detail = #{planNoDetail}) as pileQnt ,
(select (b.ord_qnt - ( sum(a.man_goalperday) ) ) from man_command_view a join man_plan_view b on a.man_plan_no = b.man_plan_no and b.plan_no_detail = #{planNoDetail} group by b.ord_qnt) as pendingQnt
from ord_detail_view a join man_plan_view b on a.ord_code = b.ord_code where a.podt_code = b.podt_code and a.podt_code= #{podtCode} and b.plan_no_detail = #{planNoDetail}
